site.title: Donato Perconti - Head of Engineering | Engineering Leader

profile.name: Donato Perconti
profile.designation: Head of Engineering | Scaling Teams & Technical Excellence
profile.bio:
Engineering Leader specializing in minimalist engineering organization, mentorship, and coaching. Expert in scaling engineering teams for Series A startups, with deep focus on engineering practices and technical excellence. Over 10 years of experience building high-performing teams that deliver business-aligned products through purpose-driven innovation.

I believe in simple, effective engineering organizations that prioritize mentorship, coaching, and sustainable growth. My approach combines technical depth with leadership theory to create environments where engineers thrive and deliver exceptional results.
